pages.title: Armor Stands
pages.text: This datapack provides a book which gives you $(o)ultimate$() control over how armor stands look and behave.

If you have watched any of the members of the HermitCraft server, you are no doubt familiar with the armor stand book. If not, you're in for a treat!$(br)$(br)It is impossible to explain in words, so click the link below for an introduction.
To get a copy of the book, simply sign a written book (the contents don't matter) and name it "Statues".
